Lazarus Angbazo (amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na onye isi azụmaahịa nke Naijiria-America
Ọ bụ onye isi oche na onye nduzi nke General Electric na Naịjirịa

Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke General Electric Grid Solutions Africa. Tupu ọ malite ọrụ ya na Naịjirịa, ebe o jiri ihe karịrị ijeri $ 1 mụbaa ego GE na mba ahụ, ọ duziri ọrụ mpaghara GE n'etiti afọ puku abuo na asatọ na Puku abụọ na iri na abụọ  dị ka Onye isi ala na onye isi oche, West, Eat & Central Africa
Ọ bụkwa oy isi oche nke American Business Council na Naịjirịa. Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke GE Energy Connection Africa.
A mụrụ Lazarus Angbazo na Keffi, Nasarawa Steeti nke Naijiria n'ime ezinụlọ eze nke Angbazo
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Eggon, site na obodo Awayi nke Wakama Development area nke Nassarawa Eggón, Nasarawa State, Nigeria
Nna ya, His Royal Highness late (Dr.) Bala A
Angbazo, bụ Aren Eggon, onye ọchịchị ọdịnala nke ndị Eggón, na nne ya
Polina Angbazo, bụ eze nwanyị.
Ọ gara Government College Keffi
O nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello Zaria na First Class Honors Degree na mgbakọ na mwepụ n'afọ one thousand nine hundred and eighty two
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ gụrụ Injinia na Nnyocha Ọrụ maka nzere masta ya na Mahadum Iowa tupu ọ nweta PhD na Corporate Finance na Маhadụ New York.
Angbazo sonyeere GE site na JP Morgan Chase & Co na afọ Puku abụọ na anọ ebe ọ bụ osote onye isi oche, Corporate Treasury and Development
Ọ malitere dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na onye ọrụ ahịa nke GE Commercial & Industrial Finance
Ọ bukwara MD, Industry Client Coverage Team na GE Capital na Puku abụọ na isii tupu e zighachi ya iduzi ọrụ West, East na Central Africa dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ GE na mpaghara ahụ
N'afọ Puku abụọ na iri abụo, Angbazo ghọrọ Chief Executive nke ọrụ azụmahịa GE na Naịjirịa ebe ọ mụbara ego okpukpu abụọ ruo ihe karịrị ijeri $ 1
Ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ime ka itinye ego nke GE nke ijeri $ 1 maka ịmepụta ọtụtụ mmepụta na ọrụ maka Africa gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ na'ọrụ maka turbines ike na Calabar, Cross River steeti.
General Electric bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwenye nwa oge na Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa maka ịrụ ọrụ nke usoro ụgbọ okporo ígwè dị warara nke Nigeria
Nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta nke onye isi oche GE Nigeria, Angbazo duziri, ruru Nde $ 45 maka oge nke ọrụ ahụ na Ijeri  $ 2.9 maka akụkụ niile nke oru ngo ahụ.

Angbazo mụbara ọrụ GE na Naịjirịa site na ihe dị ka ndị ọrụ Nári abụo ruo Nári ise n'ime afọ atọ, ebe ihe dịka pasent iri itoolu nke ndị na-arụ ọrụ na mba Naijiria na pasenta iri asatọ nke ọkwa ndị isi na nzukọ ahụ. General Electric Nigeria bụkwa nke a họpụtara site na ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ, Jobberman dị ka uno olu Naijiria kachasị mma ịrụ ọrụ na afọ Puku abụọ na iri na isii
Angbazo bụ osote prọfesọ nke ego na Mahadum Purdue, Indiana n'etiti Septemba Otu puku na iri itoolu na iri itoolu na abụọ ruo Mee Otu puku na narị itoolu na iri itoolu na asaa

N'oge a, ọ were ezumike ezumezu Maka otu afọ wee sonye na Fannie Mae, dị ka Director-Housing Finance Research site na Otu puku na narị itoolu na iri itoolu na ise ruo Otu puku na narị itoolu na iri itoolu na isii

O dere ọtụtụ edemede nyocha na ego ụlọ ọrụ na ahịa isi obodo bipụtara na Journal of Fixed Income, Journal nke Banking and Finance, European Finance Review, Magazine of Risk and Insurance, na Management Science Journal
Ọ bụ ọkà okwu na Krannert Executive Forum naKrannart School of Management, Mahadum Purdue.
Angbazo na-anọdụ ugbu a na bọọdụ nke ọtụtụ mahadum na ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa na Naijiria gụnyere Lagos Business School nke Mahadum Pan-Atlantic, Africa-America Institute na Machịbụrụ Bingham.

A họpụtara Angbazo dị ka onye otu Naịjirịa Industrial Policy and Competitiveness Advisory Council nke onyeisi oche, osote onye isi ala Naijiria bụ Prọfesọ Yemi Osinbajo. Ndị ọchụnta ego ndị ọzọ nọ na kansụl ahụ gụnyere nwoke kachasị baa ọgaranya n'Africa, Aliko Dangote onye bụ osote onyeisi oche ya
A na-atụ anya na kansụl ahụ ga-ebute ụzọ n'ihe omume ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa iji bulie onyinye nke mmepụta ihe na Gross Domestic Product (GDP) nke mba ahụ.
Ọ lụrụ Joyce Lin ma ha nwere ụmụ abụọ; Saraya, nwa nwanyị na Jonathan, otu nwa nwoke
Ha bi na Abuja. Ọ bụ nwanne Major Gen
Nuhu Bala Angbazo (Ndị agha Naijiria) na Dr
James Ang bazo the (Dan Galadima Eggon).
